body_html:
A quick googling shows that CUFFT_ALLOC_FAILED is roughly saying cuda OOM. (25088, 4001, 2) might be just be too big. But I'll look at this in depth later today.

edit: input is around 765MB

body:
A quick googling shows that CUFFT_ALLOC_FAILED is roughly saying cuda OOM. `(25088, 4001, 2)` might be just be too big. But I'll look at this in depth later today.

edit: input is around 765MB
